content.label: This game is so underrated! I can‚Äôt believe how good it is. It needs to go viral.

title.label: Cutest and most fun little game!

content.label: The most addictive and cheery music, the cutest little characters and fun puzzles to solve as you kill lots of spookily adorable mobs!
I remember playing this game a lot when I was younger, just as fun now as it was then
Hey, we need a new version. My daughter stomps me at this game, but it‚Äôs still a blast to play. Hope you update it someday, but glad it‚Äôs here as a classic.

title.label: Super Good Game but Missing one thing

content.label: This game is awesome and I have played it for the longest I can remember but the thing to get the game even better is adding in a level creator option so us people can create levels and share them to the community. If you added that, this game would be even better.
I remember playing this game a lot when I was younger, then playing it again two years ago, then today, I finally reinstalled it and I still love this game.

title.label: One of the first games I had.

content.label: Been playing this game since I got an iPod Touch as a kid. Man I have some good memories with this game on road trips. Big TY to the dev for keeping it updated.

title.label: It‚Äôs like Super Mario Galaxy in 2D!

content.label: I love the wacky and creative levels. Reminds me a a lot of Super Mario Galaxy. Best game on the App Storeüòä
I remember playing this game many years ago when the iphone was relatively new. Such a fun game.
Remembered getting this years ago, never beat it but I did just now and oh bOy it was like nostalgia stabbing me in the back each step I took ^^ definitely recommend!
This game is so adorable and fun. Omg, loving it so much. Keep up the good work. I play swordigo and enjoyed that as.

title.label: I played this game when I was soooo young (five

content.label: I loved it. Me and my brother had raced and saw who could get to the end level first, he was always better. I still play this game to this day and hope they make a second one.
pretty fun, but there are moments where it just feels unfair, and not because of skill but because of the game. Otherwise the mechanics are fun and interesting and it's a fun game
Best game I‚Äôve played when I was younger

This and swordigo (same developer) are my favorite games for iPhone. I wish the developers would make another game. Maybe a sequel to swordigo with a more femme hero. If anyone has recommendations to similar (hopefully free) games for iPhone please let me know. Twitter @cassirosee These developers are amazing and I love both games.

I got this game when it came out ten years ago and just remembered how much I loved it today. I haven‚Äôt seen another game in all these years that matches it. The characters and storyline are so cute, it‚Äôs just challenging enough to not be brutally frustrating at the higher levels.
Hands down, best game ever üíØI found this game when I was little and loved it and now I love it again!!!

I have loved this game FOREVER! I started playing when I was about 6 on my first iPad, and was obsessed with it. For any little kids out here, this is a fun, not scary, game for killing time in the car.
it‚Äôs so much fun and so cute!! no ads either. first played it on my ipod and am now playing it on my phone. i‚Äôve beat the game so many times but still end up replaying it anyways.
I am like actually addicted to this game!! Although come levels are frustrating, they keep pulling me In to keep playing!! Best game by far that I have ever playedü§™

This game causes so much motion sickness I wondered if the whole thing‚Äôs a social experiment. The test: See if people keep playing an addictive game even if it makes them sick. If it weren‚Äôt for that, it‚Äôd be ok. Swordigo (made by same people) is way better and doesn‚Äôt make you barf.

The iPhone X is my first iPhone since the 3GS, and I was really excited to be able to go back and play all of the old games I used to play, only to be really disappointed to find that iOS11 made them unplayable. It is awesome when devs actually support older games like this and don‚Äôt let their older work just disappear.

It is one of my all time favorites, like FlyingHamster, Call Of Atlantis, 4 Elements 1 & 2, Red Ball 3 and more. I used to play it when I was like 4, and it truly was one of the best games I ever played. That‚Äôs an easy 5 star. Thanks for all th grateness you 
putted in this game. I haven‚Äôt checked your other game but I will after this. With love, I won‚Äôt say my real name, so With love, Zarabatana
And I love SOOSIZ.  It‚Äôs that good.
Unique twist on platform game mechanics plus very good game design. So happy that the developers updated this old favorite.
Totally recommend. it's a great game!! and is so fun for my friends and I.

I first got this app years ago, on my iPod Touch, and i loved it. Once I got a phone, i forgot about it, but I always wondered what that one app that I always played was called. I spent hours looking for my old iPod Touch, and eventually found it, charged it, and looked up the apps that I used to play. I downloaded Soosiz on my phone, and all the memories came back. I love this game so much, and every time I finish the game, I reset the progress and do it all over again. You should definitely download Soosiz!

This game has the perfect gameplay mechanics, such as gravity, idle spikes, spike rollers and such. The boss levels at the end of each world has a varying level of skill needed to win, and the creators lair is certainly my favorite level. 5/5 would recommend

This is by far my favorite game on the iPhone! It is awesome! The controls are fantastic and there are many levels. If you enjoyed the old Mario games you will love this! I only wish they would make a Soosiz 2 or even another platformer with similar controls.
Overall it's a pretty good game.
Fun game
These developers have really killed it! Not a single thing to complain about. No matter what! You need to get this game!
I LOVE this game. I think it's much better than Caterzillar...
This game makes you feel really emerged in the game! Every time I jump I get butterflies in my stomach. This game has been my favorite for years, well done!

I love this game just as much as when if first got it 6 years ago. It's a game I'll delete when I need space on my phone and then re-download a week later out of wonder where it went. It always gives me something to do when I have nothing better. Definitely recommend this game for all!

title.label: Finally rating one of my all time favorite iOS games!

content.label: Soosiz is still just as fun today as it was when I first installed it at launch all those years ago! Holds up extremely well, updated for iOS 9 and chock full of amazing content and high replayability! If you haven't yet played this, then you owe it to yourself to smash the BUY button immediately and begin enjoying this absolute classic of iOS Platforming goodness!

I stumbled upon Soosiz when it was mentioned in the review of another game. What a find! I am not affiliated with this game in any way, and I am not being paid for this- I just love it that much and I want a sequel! I'm at the halfway point, and I can't imagine what's ahead in the next worlds.This game ranks right up there with Mario, but the way you can walk around and under things with the screen flipping with you is amazing! There is a light version. If you're skeptical, try it. I personally haven't seen it cuz I bought the game outright. And to the geniuses at Touch Foo: SOOSIZ 2!!!
If you will play it once, you will love it forever.
This is a fantastic platformer. Playing it for the 2nd time. Wish there was a sequel.
Great game.
I've had this game since 2009 when it had first come out, I remember this being one of the first apps I ever had bought on my moms phone. It's been years and I still remember the name of this game.
This game is fun, and hard but this game really needs a sequel

i love the ui design and music :) its always fun
I loved it on my old iPhone but now I have the iPhone 6 and it gets to the opening load screen and never opens the game! Why?? Great game but doesn't seem fit for iOS 8.

This is by far my favorite game the App Store has!! Even after defeating the game three times, it is still a blast. Please make a sequel!
